name: 占星师Astrologer
description:
game introduction

Give you an epic decryption experience.
The problem is coming
Become a stargazer
Now, decryption has begun.
Help people get rid of troubles!
A classic decryption game, I hope to bring you happiness.

 
Game content: including 2 hours of game time,
Explore and investigate people's hearts in the stars and dreams.
Excellent music and beautiful avatars can help you enjoy the game more.

Gameplay:
You can use ↑↓←→ control character movement and space bar to investigate.
A decryption game that investigates people's troubles.
And help them. The ending will vary depending on your choice.
